meanings.definition: To look through casually or quickly
meanings.sent1: She was browsing the store shelves for a new book to read.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy browsing through magazines at the waiting room.
meanings.sent3: While browsing the menu, she accidentally ordered the spiciest dish.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were browsing the crowd, searching for his lost friend.
meanings.sent5: The cat was browsing the garden for a sunny spot to nap.

meanings.definition: To access and view information on the internet without a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: He spent hours browsing online for the best deals on electronics.
meanings.sent2: I like browsing social media to see what my friends are up to.
meanings.sent3: While browsing the web, she stumbled upon a funny cat video.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a browser, constantly browsing different thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Browsing the internet is like exploring a vast digital library.
